definition: to help/to assist/mutual assistance/to rush into or up/to raise or hold up/high/tall/old variant of 欀/chariot horse (old)/change (old)
to pray for luck and sacrifice to avoid disasters (i.e. traditional superstitions)
to pray to the gods for the avoidance of a misfortune

sentences.english: Taking preventive action beforehand and remedial action afterwards are the two common methods of warding off taboos.
sentences.chinese: 事前设防和事后补救是禳解禁忌的两种常用的方法。

sentences.english: The blogs are a cross-section of Iranian society.
sentences.chinese: 这些网志的内容禳括伊朗社会的方方面面。

sentences.english: The governments of Qin and Han dynasty took much account of organize the society to reduce disasters as well.
sentences.chinese: 秦汉政府注重禳灾，也很重视组织社会开展减灾工作。

definition: to pray to the gods for the avoidance of a misfortune
to ward off calamities/to avoid disaster
to pray for luck and sacrifice to avoid disasters (i.e. traditional superstitions)
to cleanse/to remove evil/ritual for seeking good fortune and avoiding disaster
to drive out devils and spirits exorcism
